about.title: About me
about.description: Hi, I'm a frontend developer from the austrian city Linz. Computers & technology have always been a great passion of mine. I would like to share this passion with others.
about.fact1: I love the idea of creating something from scratch, that supports and inspires people in their daily tasks.
about.fact2: Due to the fact, I have learned new technologies through my further training in order to not only build functional applications, but also to round them off with an appealing design and user-friendly operation.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.project0: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.project1: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.alert: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!

contactform.name: Your name is required
contactform.privacy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
